mapper.select: SELECT RESUMESEQ FROM RESUMEMAIN WHERE PERSONID=#{personId}

SELECT CAREERSEQ , RESUMESEQ , COMPANYNAME , CAREERCATEGORY , TO_CHAR(CAREERSTARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CAREERSTARTDATE , TO_CHAR(CAREERENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CAREERENDDATE , CAREERDEPARTMENT , CAREERPOSITION , CAREERREGION , CAREERSALARY , CAREERTASK , CAREERDETAILS
FROM CAREER WHERE RESUMESEQ=#{resumeSeq}

SELECT CERTISEQ , RESUMESEQ , CERTITITLE , CERTIORG , TO_CHAR(CERTIDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CERTIDATE
FROM CERTI WHERE RESUMESEQ=#{resumeSeq}

SELECT ABILITYSEQ ,RESUMESEQ ,ABILITYTITLE ,ABILITYSTATUS ,ABILITYDETAILS
FROM Ability WHERE RESUMESEQ=#{resumeSeq}

SELECT educationSeq ,resumeSeq ,educationFlag ,schoolName ,major ,diploma ,TO_CHAR(eduStartDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') eduStartDate ,TO_CHAR(eduEndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') eduEndDate
FROM EDUCATION WHERE RESUMESEQ=#{resumeSeq}
